sentences.en: Err, fall, sin if you will, but be upright.
sentences.cn: 你们尽管在歧路徘徊, 失足, 犯错误, 但总应当做个正直的人.

sentences.en: He who is suBject to temptations tends to err.
sentences.cn: 不能抗拒诱感的人,往往要犯错误.
血气旺盛有时会造成过失的.

sentences.en: In this book, we prefer to err in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 本书中, 我们宁愿犯相反的错误.

sentences.en: It has been borne in upon him that even sages err.
sentences.cn: 他认识到:即使圣贤也会犯错误.

sentences.en: It is best to err on the side of prudence.
it is better to err on the side of caution.
It is better to err on the side of mercy.
It's best to err on the safe side.
sentences.cn: 即使错,最好也错在谨慎上面.

sentences.en: It’s always best to err on the side of caution.
sentences.cn: 过于谨慎永远比冒风险强。

sentences.en: She would not err in any way, if she could help it.
sentences.cn: 只要有可能的话,她要避免做错任何动作.

sentences.en: They may be wise to err on the side of caution.
sentences.cn: 他们过于谨慎也许是明智的。

sentences.en: To err is human, and nobody likes a perfect person.
sentences.cn: 是人都会犯错，而且谁也不喜欢完人。

sentences.en: To err is human, to forgive divine . -- A . Pope.
sentences.cn: 失误人皆有之, 而宽恕乃超人之举. -- 蒲柏.

sentences.en: To err is human, to forgive is divine.
sentences.cn: 犯错是人之常情, 宽恕是超凡的.

sentences.en: To err is human, to forgive, divine.
sentences.cn: 犯错误是人之常情, 宽恕是非凡的行为.

words.tran_cn: 错误；错误状态；犯错误的倾向

phrases.phrase: to err is human, to forgive divine
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)犯错人皆难免，宽恕则属超凡

trans.tran_en: to be more careful or safe than is necessary, in order to make sure that nothing bad happens
